content: I prefer Python 3.12 for all backend development projects. Always use type hints and async/await patterns.

For FastAPI projects, use this standard structure:
- Routers in /app/routers/
- Models in /app/models/
- Dependencies in /app/dependencies/
- Always include CORS middleware
Use PostgreSQL with pgvector for projects requiring semantic search. Configure connection pooling with min 5, max 20 connections.
Write tests using pytest with async support. Structure: tests/ mirrors app/ structure. Use fixtures for database setup. Aim for 80%+ coverage.

Docker Compose setup:
- Development: mount volumes for hot reload
- Production: multi-stage builds
- Always include health checks
- Use .dockerignore to exclude .git, __pycache__, venv
